safetyTips: Food in a sealed hygiene container, in a heated delivery bag. Drivers have hand sanitiser and the bag is washed after every delivery. On the collection we have sectioned off bays with collection tables and social distancing space is observed.
name: THE KENNINGTON
address: The Kennington, Ulley Road, Kennington, Ashford, Kent, TN24 9HX
website: The Kennington, Ulley Road, Kennington, Ashford, Kent, TN24 9HX
description: The Kennington offers great Carvery food, Delicious Burger Menu, Great alternative menu, Gluten Free, Vegan, Kids Menu & Delicious desserts. There is no mininum spend, you can click & collect Wednesday to Sunday or for a small cost there is a full delivery service. Served on a ridged disposbale plate with hygiene lid. So no washing up!! Order online or by phone.
